function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Factory shutdowns impacting automobile production","Impact":"Loss of employment and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Implementing remote work and safety protocols, diversifying supply chains","Technologies":"Remote work technology, automated manufacturing processes","People":"Automobile industry workers","Owner":"Automobile manufacturers, government"},{"Description":"Massive impact on aviation industry due to travel bans","Impact":"Sharp decline in air travel and revenue loss","Mitigation":"Implementing health and safety measures, diversifying revenue streams","Technologies":"Health screening technology, contactless check-in systems","People":"Airline employees, passengers","Owner":"Airlines, airport authorities"},{"Description":"Decrease in demand for new aircraft purchases","Impact":"Economic loss for aircraft manufacturers","Mitigation":"Adapting production to meet alternative demand, exploring new markets","Technologies":"Market analysis software, adaptive manufacturing systems","People":"Aircraft manufacturers, employees","Owner":"Aircraft manufacturers, government"}]}
